Bash("D:\\agentdashboard\\README.md" << 'HEREDOC_EOF'
# Claude Agent Dashboard

A real-time monitoring dashboard for [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\) agent teams.

## Quick Start

```bash
npm install
npm start
```

Open http://localhost:5173

## Features

- Real-time agent monitoring
- Task tracking and progress
- Inter-agent communication
- Live activity streams
- System metrics

## Documentation

See [FEATURES.md]\(FEATURES.md\) for detailed feature list.

## License

MIT
HEREDOC_EOF)
